message: Is there any other open source or other software that gives statistical overview of your repository?
Gource isn't really a statistic tool but it may help you to see how contributors did work on the project http://code.google.com/p/gource/
https://github.com/visionmedia/git-extras provides some interesting additonnal git subcommands.
Thanks a lot, these are really neat. There is also gitstats, a clone of svnstats for git. http://gitstats.sourceforge.net/
@defunkt sloccount says I'm worth $50k everytime I start a weekend project
@alex Your weekends probably are worth $50k in enterprise project dollars
@alex Send a self-addressed stamped envelope to Google
@alex so you agree it's an awesome tool then
@alex It takes a suit, powerpoint and the ability to say with a straight face that any routine task in computing will take six months to deliver
